ygData.subject: General discussion
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail fellow paladins, I was just wondering if anyone has heard the whereabouts of the Man o War.  Its a paladin only 2h hammer, and the stats don t sound too
ygData.messageBody:
Hail fellow paladins,

I was just wondering if anyone has heard the whereabouts of the Man o
War. Its a paladin only 2h hammer, and the stats don't sound too bad.
I'm in no rush to get it, since I have Ghoulbane and have just recently
obtained Soulfire (3rd person on the Karana server) after numerous
attempts on Sir Lucan (of course his testimony is the rare drop...doh).
Anyways, I'm just trying to bring some life back to this board....feel
free to post any info on this holy hammer if you know anything =)
Thanks !

Valandil Lightstrider
45th rank paladin
The Combine
